Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:hen:size) $(this.appearance:feathers:color) feathered hen. Her feathers are $(this.appearance:feathers:condition) with $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) hackle feathers and $(this.appearance:tail:type) tail.
A hen's sharp curved claw. Useful for scratching the ground.
A $(this.appearance:comb:size), $(this.appearance:comb:type) $(this.appearance:comb:color) comb crowning this hen's head.
The $(this.appearance:eye:type) $(this.appearance:eye:color) eye of a hen {peers|gazes inquisitively|dully looks|looks|blinks|stares back|suspiciously peers} at you.
A pair of $(this.appearance:eye:type) $(this.appearance:eye:color) eyes return your gaze.
The $(this.appearance:foot:type) $(this.appearance:foot:color) foot of a hen which has $(this.appearance:foot:toes) round, strong toes and a metatarsal spur.

The $(this.appearance:head:size), $(this.appearance:feathers:color) feathered head of a hen with $(this.appearance:eye:type) eyes, $(this.appearance:comb:size) $(this.appearance:comb:color) comb and a $(this.appearance:beak:type) beak.
The $(this.appearance:head:size) head of a hen with $(this.appearance:eye:color) eyes and a $(this.appearance:beak:color) beak.
By observing the hen's breast carefully you detect her heart beating rapidly.
The feathered upper breast of a hen.

The $(this.appearance:leg:length), $(this.appearance:feathers:color) feathered leg of a hen. The lower leg is covered with $(this.appearance:foot:color) scaled skin and has a long-toed foot equipped with sturdy claws.
The $(this.appearance:neck:type) neck of a hen, adorned with attractive $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) hackle feathers.
The $(this.appearance:neck:type) $(this.appearance:feathers:color) and $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) feathered neck of a hen.
The $(this.appearance:tail:type) $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) tail of a hen, with long $(this.appearance:feathers:altcondition) feathers.
The $(this.appearance:tail:type) $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) feathered tail of a hen.
A $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) feather from the tail of this bird.
By feeling the vent carefully, you might detect whether this hen is ready to lay any eggs.
The genital area of a hen, from which eggs are laid.
A hen's $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) wing; $(this.appearance:wings:shape) and carried well tucked up.
A primary $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) feather. It appears to be $(this.appearance:feathers:condition).
A hen's $(this.appearance:wings:shape) $(this.appearance:feathers:altcolor) feathered wings. Outstretched, they appear to be just long enough for a short flight to a low tree branch.
